segments.text: What are the factors that have great impact on the perspective of this corporation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: External factors . I think the main external factors are political , economic , social and technological factors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the internal factors that influence the company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The internal factors are composed of human resources , team spirit , innovation spirit and coordination between different departments , etc .
segments.speaker: S2
